main.name: Noggins Sante Centre
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Since crafting our first handmade artisan bread in 2019, we've been dedicated to the principle of local businesses serving local communities. As a staple of every day life, we believe no compromises can be made in producing the highest quality breads. You'll see it in our handcrafted specialty and dessert breads, and you'll taste the attention we put to each and every loaf.
main.contactmessage: Comments? Questions? We're happy to hear from you!

products.name: Honey Whole Wheat
products.description: Whole wheat bread with organic honey and a hint of organic coconut.

products.name: Italian Herb and Old Cheddar Focaccia
products.description: Traditional Focaccia bread made with a blend of Italian spices and old cheddar. Pairs well with tomato-based pasta dishes, Merlot (oaked, dry), Cabernet Sauvignon, and Sangiovese. A taste of Italy!

products.name: Dinner Rolls
products.description: White or whole wheat dinner rolls, the perfect companion for a bowl of soup, or to compliment the family dinner.

products.name: Chocolate Babka
products.description: Rich chocolate layers are woven into this luxurious braided loaf, to be enjoyed as a dessert with specialty coffee, drizzled with caramel, or as a companion to your favourite ice cream. Enjoy this holiday treat with a glass of egg nog or chilled Irish Cream.

products.name: Cinnamon Babka
products.description: Playful cinnamon accents make this braided loaf a delightful treat to enjoy over the holiday season. Prepare your favourite french toast batter recipe for a unique and impressive breakfast offering!

products.name: Traditional Sourdough
products.description: Playful cinnamon accents make this braided loaf a delightful treat to enjoy over the holiday season. Prepare your favourite french toast batter recipe for a unique and impressive breakfast offering!

testimonials.text: It has become a staple in our home. Everything is delicious, and it's often still warm when we pick it up! The butter melts just like I remember as a kid on baking day.
I thought she was going to quit, but then she came in with an awesome loaf of bread, and I knew we had to get it on the shelf.
Pilgrim's Finest has some of the tastiest bread, period. My favourite is the honey whole wheat; it makes for a tasty snack!
